name: @commercetools-frontend/permissions
description: React components to declaratively handle MC permissions

scripts.build: yarn build:es && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:typings
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js  -f cjs ./src/index.ts --dir ./dist --chunkFileNames permissions-[name]-[hash].cjs.js --entryFileNames permissions-[name].cjs.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js  -f es ./src/index.ts --dir ./dist --chunkFileNames permissions-[name]-[hash].es.js --entryFileNames permissions-[name].es.js
